negative_rETH_ratio_update_event.title: :warning: Negative rETH Ratio Update
negative_rETH_ratio_update_event.description: The rETH ratio has decreased from `%{prevRETHRate}` to `%{currRETHRate}`!

service_interrupted.title: :warning: Failure in Event Processing
service_interrupted.description:
The developer has automatically been notified of this Error.
No further action is required.

pool_deposit_assigned_single_event.title: :rocket: Deposit Assigned To Minipool
pool_deposit_assigned_single_event.description_small: :handshake: Minipool %{minipool_clean} owned by Operator %{node} has been matched and left the queue! %{transactionHash_small}

pool_deposit_assigned_event.title: :rocket: Deposit Assigned To Minipools
pool_deposit_assigned_event.description_small: :handshake: %{assignmentCount} Minipools have been matched and left the queue! %{transactionHash_small}

pool_deposit_recycled_event.title: :recycle: Pool Deposit By Protocol Contract
pool_deposit_recycled_event.description: A Protocol Contract deposited **%{amount} ETH** into the Deposit Pool!
pool_deposit_recycled_event.description_small: :recycle: A Protocol Contract deposited **%{amount} ETH** into the Deposit Pool! %{transactionHash_small}

minipool_exit_event.title: :leaves: Minipool Closed
minipool_exit_event.description: Minipool %{minipool} has been flagged as Withdrawable!

minipool_withdrawal_processed_event.title: :moneybag: Minipool Withdrawal
minipool_withdrawal_processed_event.description_small: :moneybag: **%{totalAmount} ETH** has been distributed from Minipool %{minipool}, owned by Operator %{node}! %{transactionHash_small}

pool_deposit_event.title: :rocket: Pool Deposit
pool_deposit_event.description: **%{amount} ETH** deposited into the Deposit Pool!
pool_deposit_event.description_small: :rocket: %{fancy_from} deposited **%{amount} ETH** into the Deposit Pool! %{transactionHash_small}

odao_rewards_snapshot_event.title: :camera_with_flash: Reward Snapshot Published
odao_rewards_snapshot_event.description:
Snapshot #%{rewardIndex} has been published by the oDAO!
It spans from <t:%{intervalStartTime}> till <t:%{intervalEndTime}>

odao_rewards_snapshot_submission_event.title: :writing_hand: Reward Snapshot Submission Submitted
odao_rewards_snapshot_submission_event.description: %{from} has published their submission for Snapshot #%{rewardIndex}

odao_member_join_event.title: :new: oDAO Member Joined
odao_member_join_event.description: %{nodeAddress} joined the oDAO with a Bond of %{rplBondAmount} RPL!

rpl_inflation_event.title: :chart_with_upwards_trend: RPL Inflation Occurred
rpl_inflation_event.description: %{value} new RPL minted! The new Total Supply is %{total_supply} RPL.

milestone_rpl_stake.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_rpl_stake.description: %{result_value} RPL has been staked by Node Operators!

milestone_max_deposit_size.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_max_deposit_size.description: The maximum deposit size has reached **%{result_value}** ETH!

milestone_rpl_swapped.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_rpl_swapped.description: %{result_value}% of all RPL has been exchanged for the new Version!

bootstrap_odao_member.title: :satellite_orbital: oDAO Bootstrap Mode: Member Added
bootstrap_odao_member.description: %{nodeAddress} added as a new oDAO Member!

bootstrap_odao_disable.title: :satellite_orbital: oDAO Bootstrap Mode: Disabled Bootstrap Mode
bootstrap_odao_disable.description: Bootstrap mode for the oDAO has been disabled!

bootstrap_pdao_multi.title: :satellite_orbital: pDAO Bootstrap Mode: Multiple Settings Modified

bootstrap_pdao_claimer.title: :satellite_orbital: pDAO Bootstrap Mode: Changed Reward Distribution
bootstrap_pdao_claimer.description: Contract `%{contractName}` has been allocated %{perc}% of the Inflation!

bootstrap_pdao_disable.title: :satellite_orbital: pDAO Bootstrap Mode: Disabled Bootstrap Mode
bootstrap_pdao_disable.description: Bootstrap mode for the pDAO has been disabled!

minipool_scrub_event.title: :rotating_light: Minipool Scrubbed
minipool_scrub_event.description: Minipool %{minipool} has been scrubbed likely due to having invalid withdrawal credentials on the beacon chain!

vacant_minipool_scrub_event.title: :rotating_light: Vacant Minipool Scrubbed
vacant_minipool_scrub_event.description: Vacant Minipool %{minipool} has been scrubbed likely due to **%{scrub_reason}**!

vacant_minipool_scrub_vote_event.title: :warning: Vacant Minipool Voted For Scrub
vacant_minipool_scrub_vote_event.description_small: :warning: %{member} has voted to scrub Vacant Minipool %{minipool}! %{transactionHash_small}

node_rpl_slash_event.title: :rotating_light: Node Operator Slashed
node_rpl_slash_event.description: Node Operator %{node} has been slashed for **%{amount} RPL** (%{ethValue} ETH)!

minipool_penalty_updated.title: :rotating_light: Minipool Penalty Updated
minipool_penalty_updated.description: Minipool %{minipoolAddress} has had its Penalty increased to %{penalty_perc}%!

node_smoothing_pool_joined.title: :cup_with_straw: Node Operator Joined Smoothing Pool
node_smoothing_pool_joined.description: Node Operator %{node} joined the Smoothing Pool with their %{minipoolCount} Minipools!

node_smoothing_pool_left.title: :leaves: Node Operator Left Smoothing Pool
node_smoothing_pool_left.description: Node Operator %{node} has left the Smoothing Pool with their %{minipoolCount} Minipools!

auction_lot_create_event.title: :scales: Lot Created
auction_lot_create_event.description: %{by} created Lot #%{lotIndex}, which will auction off %{rplAmount} RPL!

auction_bid_event.title: :scales: Bid On Lot
auction_bid_event.description: %{by} bid %{bidAmount} ETH for %{rplAmount} RPL on Lot #%{lotIndex}!

minipool_prestake_event.title: :construction_site: Minipool Initial Deposit
minipool_prestake_event.description: Minipool %{minipool_clean} has deposited its initial 16 ETH to the Beacon Chain!

minipool_deposit_received_event.title: :construction_site: Minipool Created
minipool_deposit_received_event.description: Minipool %{minipool_clean} has been created with a operator share of **%{depositAmount} ETH**!

minipool_deposit_received_event_credit.title: :magic_wand: Minipool Created Using Credit
minipool_deposit_received_event_credit.description:
Minipool %{minipool_clean} has been created with a operator share of **%{depositAmount} ETH**!
**%{creditAmount} ETH** worth of Credit used for this deposit!

minipool_bond_reduction_started_event.title: :magic_wand: Minipool Bond Reduction Initiated
minipool_bond_reduction_started_event.description_small: :compression: %{node} initiated a bond reduction for their minipool %{minipool_clean} from **%{previousBondAmount} ETH** to **%{newBondAmount} ETH**! %{transactionHash_small}

minipool_bond_reduce_event.title: :magic_wand: Minipool Bond Reduced
minipool_bond_reduce_event.description_small: :magic_wand: %{node} reduced the bond of their minipool %{minipool_clean} from **%{previousBondAmount} ETH** to **%{newBondAmount} ETH**! %{transactionHash_small}

minipool_vote_against_bond_reduction_eve.title: :warning: Voted Against Bond Reduction
minipool_vote_against_bond_reduction_eve.description: %{member} has voted against the bond reduction of Minipool %{minipool}!

minipool_bond_reduction_cancelled_event.title: :rotating_light: Bond Reduction Cancelled
minipool_bond_reduction_cancelled_event.description: Minipool %{minipool} has been denied the ability to reduce its bond!

mev_proposal_event.title: :moneybag: Large Minipool Proposal
mev_proposal_event.description: Minipool %{minipool} has proposed a Block worth **%{reward_amount} ETH**!

mev_proposal_smoothie_event.title: :cup_with_straw: Large Smoothing Pool Proposal
mev_proposal_smoothie_event.description:
Minipool %{minipool} has proposed a Block worth **%{reward_amount} ETH**!
 The Smoothing Pool now has a balance of **%{smoothie_amount} ETH**!

minipool_vacancy_prepared_event.title: :link: Solo Migration Initiated
minipool_vacancy_prepared_event.description: Migration of solo validator %{pubkey} to Minipool %{minipool} with a bond of **%{bondAmount} ETH** was initiated!

minipool_failed_deposit.title: :fire: Failed Minipool Deposit
minipool_failed_deposit.description: :fire_engine: %{node} burned **%{burnedValue} ETH** trying to create a minipool! :fire_engine:

odao_member_challenge_event.title: :rotating_light: oDAO Member Challenge Started
odao_member_challenge_event.description:
%{nodeChallengedAddress_clean} has been challenged by %{nodeChallengerAddress_clean}!
They have to respond before %{challengeDeadline} or they will be kicked from the oDAO!

odao_member_challenge_accepted_event.title: :warning: oDAO Member Challenge Passed
odao_member_challenge_accepted_event.description:
%{nodeChallengedAddress_clean} has been successfully challenged!
Their bond of %{rplBondAmount} RPL has been burned and they have been kicked out of the oDAO!

odao_member_challenge_rejected_event.title: :no_entry_sign: oDAO Member Challenge Rejected
odao_member_challenge_rejected_event.description: %{nodeChallengedAddress_clean} has responded to the challenge, making it invalid!

deposit_pool_queue_clear_full.title: :tada: Deposit Pool Queue Clear
deposit_pool_queue_clear_full.description: %{node} cleared %{count} Minipools from the Deposit Pool Queue!

deposit_pool_queue_clear_partial.title: :tada: Partial Deposit Pool Queue Clear
deposit_pool_queue_clear_partial.description: %{node} cleared %{count} Minipools from the Deposit Pool Queue!

odao_minipool_penalty_updated.title: :rotating_light: Minipool Penalty
odao_minipool_penalty_updated.description: The Maximum Minipool Penalty Rate has been raised to %{rate_perc}%!

cow_order_buy_rpl_found.title: :cow: BUY Order Found

cow_order_sell_rpl_found.title: :cow: SELL Order Found
